title: Does anyone know the font for Cheers logo?
content:
Does anyone know the font for Cheers logo?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150115070218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images_4813.jpg)
author: earth2heather

comments.content:
I think it's a hand-drawn logo,however the Letraset font [Cabaret](http://web.archive.org/web/20150115070218/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/cabaret/) has a very similar feel.

- Mike Yanega

Cabaret was used for the credits, so they probably drew this to match.

- Lex
